u-log-viewer/visible.description: Controls the log viewer to show or hide

u-log-viewer/normal-display.description: Related to the maximize toggle button. Display mode when not maximized.

u-log-viewer/maximized-display.description: Related to the maximize toggle button. Display method when maximized.

u-log-viewer/fetchLogs.description: The "Pull Log" button will only be displayed when this property has a value. It is used for custom pull method processing, because the component itself does not implement the pull log logic.

u-log-viewer/openInNewTab.description: The "Open in New Window" button will only be displayed when this property has a value. If it is a string, it will be opened as a string. If it is a function, it will be customized as a function.

u-log-viewer/buffer-wait.description: Prevent high-frequency log appending. Set the log throttling interval (ms)

u-log-viewer/view-count.description: Prevent rendering lag due to a large number of logs. Set the number of DOMs actually rendered.
